name: impact-nutrition
description: Impact Nutrition E-commerce Platform - Monorepo with Next.js frontend and Strapi CMS

scripts.dev: concurrently -n WEB,CMS,API -c auto --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:cms" "npm run dev:api"
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:cms && npm run build:api
scripts.start: concurrently -n WEB,CMS,API -c auto --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start:web" "npm run start:cms" "npm run start:api"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:build
scripts.clean:build: rm -rf apps/web/.next apps/cms/build apps/cms/.tmp apps/api/dist apps/api/admin-ui
scripts.install:apps: cd apps/web && npm install && cd ../cms && npm install && cd ../api && npm install

author: Impact Nutrition Team
